description: A shell script for configuring, building, and managing dependencies of a CMake-based build system. It provides utilities to create makefiles, build core components, and handle third-party dependencies, with options for different build configurations and target platforms.

methods.name: showUsage
methods.description: Outputs usage instructions for the setup-build.sh script.

methods.name: showHeader
methods.description: Displays a formatted header banner with a given message.

methods.name: checkTools
methods.description: Verifies presence of essential build tools (cmake, gcc, java) in the environment.

methods.name: checkThirdParty
methods.description: Checks if third-party dependencies are already built for the specified target.

methods.name: checkTargetPlatform
methods.description: Ensures that the target platform/build model is set correctly.

methods.name: runBuildThirdParty
methods.description: Creates makefiles and builds third-party dependencies.

methods.name: resolveThirdParty
methods.description: Resolves and prepares third-party dependencies if needed.

methods.name: runCreateMakefiles
methods.description: Generates makefiles for the specified build model without executing a build.

methods.name: runBuildCore
methods.description: Creates makefiles and builds the core components for the target platform.

methods.name: myreadlink
methods.description: Helper function for resolving symbolic links on Darwin (macOS).
